amendment.description: Amendment makes State compliance with the Coastal Zone Act Reauthorization Amendments optional, provided that the States opting out of the program have developed other programs to achieve the same goals and that the Administrator of the EPA has authorized such plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new title to the bill, Title X, which would make state compliance with the Coastal Zone Act Reauthorization Amendments optional, provided that the states opting out of the program had developed other programs to achieve the same goals and that the Administrator of the EPA had authorized such plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
